role.argrole: thing arg0 does for a change

example.parse: (IP (ADVP (AD 後来)) (NP-PN-SBJ (NR 郑永国)) (VP (IP-ADV (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (ADVP (CS 虽然)) (VP (VP (VV 离开) (NP-OBJ (NN 考古) (NN 研究))) (PU ，) (VP (VV 转做) (NP-OBJ (NN 陶艺)))))) (PU ，) (ADVP (AD 但)) (ADVP (AD 并)) (VP (VV 没有) (VP (VV 忘情於) (NP-OBJ (DNP (NP (ADJP (JJ 史前)) (NP (NN 陶器))) (DEG 的)) (NP (NN 制作)))))))
